Sentencas: Highly dispersed nano-crystalline NiO-Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 (GDC) anode powders were synthesized through a novel water-in-oil (W/O) micro-emulsion route, that has not been previously reported.
Titulo: Preparation of nano-structured Ni-Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells via the water-in-oil (W/O) micro-emulsion route

Sentencas: The spherical-shaped NiO-Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 nano-powders exhibited a high degree of dispersion, and the morphology of the NiO-Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 particles was controlled by varying the aqueous to oil phase ratio.
Titulo: Preparation of nano-structured Ni-Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells via the water-in-oil (W/O) micro-emulsion route

Sentencas: The polarization resistance at 800 degrees C with humidified H-2 fuel and the activation energy of ME10 anode synthesized by the micro-emulsion method with the aqueous to oil phase volume ratios of 1:12 were 0.02 Omega cm(2) and 0.55 eV, respectively, which were significantly lower than those of other Ni-ceria-based anodes.
Titulo: Preparation of nano-structured Ni-Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells via the water-in-oil (W/O) micro-emulsion route

Sentencas: These properties contributed to a smaller particle size and better dispersion compared to conventional anode materials, leading to an increased number of reaction sites.
Titulo: Preparation of nano-structured Ni-Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells via the water-in-oil (W/O) micro-emulsion route

Sentencas: In accordance with the polarization resistance results, single cells containing ME10 anodes exhibited a high maximum power density of 0.36 W cm(-2) at 800 degrees C with humidified H-2 fuel.
Titulo: Preparation of nano-structured Ni-Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells via the water-in-oil (W/O) micro-emulsion route
Preparation of nano-structured Ni-Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells via the water-in-oil (W/O) micro-emulsion route
